title: About your dataset - Part 2
description: Please provide some general information about your dataset below.

homepage.title: Home page
homepage.description: Add the URL to the homepage of this dataset (if applicable).

supportChannel.description: Enter all channels through which a user can receive support for handling this research product (if applicable). This could for example be a link to a website or a contact email address.

howToCite.title: How to cite
howToCite.description: Enter the preferred citation for this dataset version.

inputData.title: Input data
inputData.description: Add the data that was used as input for this dataset version. This is typically a DOI or reference to the original dataset from which the current dataset is derived (if applicable).

_relatedPublicationIntro.title: Related publications
_relatedPublicationIntro.text: Please list DOIs of all related publications that report on the dataset itself or on analysis based on the data. The DOI should be in the following format: https://doi.org/[DOI], for example https://doi.org/10.1000/182
